head.title: Find text in {{FileFormatUp}} docs with {{ProdShortName}} for {{EnvNameShort}}
head.description: {{ProdFullName}} helps {{ProgLang}} developers quickly search text within various document formats.

header.title: Smart document text search
header.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, you can seamlessly search and extract text from multiple document types in your {{EnvNameShort}} applications.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: What does {{ProdShortName}} do?
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a robust document search and indexing library that supports over 70 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, images, and ZIP archives. It enables fast, precise, and scalable search capabilities for large document collections.

more_features.title: Enhanced search and indexing capabilities
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} simplifies text searching and indexing across 70+ document formats, providing efficient tools to manage and retrieve information quickly.

feature_1.title: Comprehensive text search
feature_1.content: Find text across multiple document formats like PDFs, Word files, and spreadsheets. Use exact matches, fuzzy search, and wildcard operators for refined search results.

feature_2.title: Optimized indexing for large data
feature_2.content: Create structured indexes to speed up searches, making it easy to navigate through extensive document repositories efficiently.

feature_3.title: Supports multiple languages
feature_3.content: Perform searches in 80+ languages with built-in support for different keyboard layouts and word morphology variations, improving accuracy.

feature_4.title: Flexible search settings
feature_4.content: Customize searches with options like case sensitivity, date-based filtering, and the ability to exclude specific words for precise results.

formats.title: Find information across {{FileFormatUp}} documents with {{ProdShortName}}
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 70 formats, including office files, enabling fast searches with advanced indexing features.

operations.title: Key features overview
operations.description: Discover high-performance text search functionalities designed for efficiency and precision.

examples.comment_1: Set the directory for storing the search index
examples.comment_2: Specify the folder containing searchable documents
examples.comment_3: Enable homophone search to match words with similar pronunciation

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes it easy to search {{FileFormatUp}} files using sophisticated logic and indexing, improving search accuracy in {{EnvName}} applications.
content.step_1: Set up a directory to store the search index.
content.step_4: Execute the search and analyze the results.

code_1.content: This example illustrates how to use search queries to search within {{FileFormatUp}} docs efficiently.
